name: Fixies Dream House Decorating
description:
What you can do:
- Choose wallpaper and floor design: different colors, patterns and funny pictures!
- Get some furniture: a sofa, a shelf, a bookcase and a table!
- Don't forget electronics: TV, air conditioner, iron or even a Play Station!
- Pick decorations: pictures, books, curtains!
- Explore the category of cool extra stuff: it has some surprises for you!

Earn coins and crystals:
Play a funny memory game with a cool company of a dog - find pairs for all cards with food and feed the dog! You will get coins and crystals which you can spend on new furniture!

Visit other rooms:
There are many rooms in the house where other players live and design! Visit them all to view rooms and help with cleaning.

While playing memory game, you can open new characters to play and get new furniture!
You can choose any design for the room (even an orange floor) and place things wherever you want. The interface is colorful and easy at use so even the youngest children can play!

Download the game and become a true designer!
Contact us if you have any questions: contact.devgame@gmail.com
